definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: An intelligent switching power supply which has adjustable output is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種輸出可調智能開關穩壓電源。

sentences.english: The paper provides valuable reference to the design of non-contact AC regulated power supply.
sentences.chinese: 該論文方案對設計無觸點交流穩壓電源具有參考價值。

sentences.english: The voltage stabilizing means in the quench air fan frequency converter speed regulating control system were introduced in detail.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了驟冷風機變頻調速控制系統穩壓的技改措施。

sentences.english: The company configurated a steady power supply for computers stored with important information.
sentences.chinese: 單位爲存儲重要資料的電腦配置了穩壓電源。

sentences.english: I was designed to debug power supply .
sentences.chinese: 本人就是設計可調試穩壓電源。

sentences.english: Permits you service the Model 30 regulator without removing it from the line.
sentences.chinese: 允許您服務，而不刪除它從示範線30穩壓器。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the principle and the measuring method of DC power supply .
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了直流穩壓電源的基本原理及其檢測方法。

sentences.english: And then the paper introduces the design of power amplifier and DC regulated power supply.
sentences.chinese: 論文重點介紹了功率放大器和直流穩壓電源的設計。

sentences.english: This paper describes a wide range of switching power supply design.
sentences.chinese: 本文詳細介紹了寬範圍開關穩壓電源的設計方法。

sentences.english: Adj, Very high current, low dropout voltage regulator.
sentences.chinese: 形容詞，非常高的電流，低壓差穩壓器。

sentences.english: Anchorage shall be carried out when the pressure stabilizing and tensioning make up is made.
sentences.chinese: 穩壓補張後回油至設計控制應力進行錨固。

sentences.english: Pulse width modulation is widely used in voltage regulators.
sentences.chinese: 脈寬調製技術是廣泛應用於穩壓器。

sentences.english: This paper will introduce the design of DC regulated power supply in detail.
sentences.chinese: 本文對直流穩壓電源的設計進行了詳細介紹。

sentences.english: Micro-computer controlled AC voltage stabilizer is a device of new technology.
sentences.chinese: 微機控制交流穩壓器是一種新技術。

sentences.english: A half bridge switching mode power supply(SMPS) based on PWM technology is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一款基於PWM技術的半橋式開關穩壓電源。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the design principle of a kind of practical isolating switching stable power supply.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種實用的隔離開關穩壓電源的設計原理。
